summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Nego new features: NotificationBell component, service price validation, Withdrawals tab, and Paystack integration. All tested features are correctly implemented in code. Registration page shows 2-step role selection flow. Dashboard loads with notification bell visible in header. Wallet page shows Paystack integration working with coin packages.

ui_bugs.issue: Dashboard header uses simple Bell icon instead of NotificationBell component with realtime subscription
ui_bugs.selector: button with Bell icon in header

integration_issues.issue: ReferenceError: window is not defined in WalletClient.tsx - react-paystack hook causes SSR error but page still renders client-side

action_items: Consider using NotificationBell component in DashboardClient header instead of simple Bell icon for realtime notifications
Fix SSR issue in WalletClient.tsx by dynamically importing react-paystack or using useEffect guard
critical_code_review_comments: NotificationBell.tsx: Correctly implements realtime Supabase subscription with data-testid='notification-bell' (line 169)
AppHeader.tsx: Uses NotificationBell component for authenticated users (line 168)
DashboardClient.tsx: Uses simple Bell icon (line 148-151) instead of NotificationBell component - notifications won't be realtime in dashboard
TalentDashboardClient.tsx: Correctly implements 5 tabs including Withdrawals (line 272)
TalentDashboardClient.tsx: Add service form shows minimum price requirement (lines 550, 559)
Paystack keys configured in .env: NEXT_PUBLIC_PAYSTACK_PUBLIC_KEY and PAYSTACK_SECRET_KEY
Talent Dashboard page correctly restricts access to talent role only (page.tsx lines 27-29)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified in code. NotificationBell component exists with realtime subscription but DashboardClient uses simple Bell icon. Talent Dashboard with Withdrawals tab only accessible to talent role users. Price validation (100,000 minimum) implemented. Paystack integration configured and working. To test Talent Dashboard features, need a user with role='talent'.

verified_working.registration_step2: ✓ Form with name, email, password fields and Create Account button
verified_working.login_page: ✓ Welcome Back title, email/password inputs, Sign In button
verified_working.dashboard_home: ✓ Welcome message, stats cards, sidebar navigation, bell icon in header
verified_working.wallet_page: ✓ Balance display, coin packages (500/1000/2500/5000), Paystack integration, transaction history

code_verified_not_ui_tested.notification_bell_component: NotificationBell.tsx with realtime Supabase subscription - exists but not used in dashboard header
code_verified_not_ui_tested.talent_dashboard_tabs: 5 tabs: Overview, Services, Gallery, Bookings, Withdrawals - code verified
code_verified_not_ui_tested.service_price_validation: MIN_SERVICE_PRICE = 100000 with error message - code verified
code_verified_not_ui_tested.withdrawal_modal: Withdrawal request form with bank details - code verified
